label: logicA:law_en
steps: [1] If the parties signed a nondisclosure agreement (NDA), then a contractual duty of confidentiality exists.
[2] If a contractual duty of confidentiality exists, then the plaintiff has a legal right to protection of its trade secrets.
[3] For every person x, if x is a licensed attorney, then x is bound by attorney-client confidentiality.
[5] The parties signed a nondisclosure agreement (NDA).
[6] A contractual duty of confidentiality exists (from [1] and [5]).
[7] The plaintiff has a legal right to protection of its trade secrets (from [2] and [6]).
[8] Lee is bound by attorney-client confidentiality (from [3] and [4]).
[9] The plaintiff has a legal right to protection of its trade secrets and Lee is bound by attorney-client confidentiality (from [7] and [8]).
